thread.title: Sunny Wayne, Shine Tom Chacko, Vinay Forrt to team up again
thread.title_full: Sunny Wayne, Shine Tom Chacko, Vinay Forrt to team up again

author: Deccan
title: Sunny Wayne, Shine Tom Chacko, Vinay Forrt to team up again
text:
Deccan Chronicle | Aravind K.S. | October 11, 2015, 23.06 pm Shine Tom Chacko After G.S. Visakh directed Masala Republic, Sunny Wayne, Shine Tom Chacko and Vinay Forrt are all set to act together. It is for M. Padmakumar’s yet to be titled film that the young actors will join their hands again.
According to the director, the film will be an investigation thriller, which goes through a senior advocate and his juniors. “Anoop Menon, who writes the script of the film, will be appearing in the role of senior advocate. The shoot will start from November,” says the director, whose Mohanlal film is all set to hit theatres this month end.
Ratheesh Vega, who had composed the sound tracks for Padmakumar’s Orissa, has been roped in as the music director of this film, which has Mahadevan Thampi as cinematographer.
